attributes.action: Government introduce a law that covicted pidofiles   should be micro chip
attributes.background:
By micro chipping all covicted  child sex offenders and pidofiles 
Would make it easy to track and provent children from becoming victims and help police track known offenders in that location of children that go missing

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by "microchipped". You could start a new petition calling for anyone convicted of a child sex offence to be fitted with an electronic tag.
